text: Use ant task to re-deploy application on Tomcat 5.5.7, sometimes it fails because "application already exists", it looks undeploy doesn't completely finish.
creator: sander.han@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: The failure of undeloy is usually caused (on windows) by resource locking. There are configuration options available to workaround these issues. Please use the users mailing list if you need further assistance.
